briefTitle: A Prospective Study of Hypothyroidism After Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Hypothyroidism After Postoperative Radiation Therapy in Patients With Breast Cancer：a Prospective Clinical Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participants with treatment-related hypothyroidism as assessed by CTCAE v4.0
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Breast cancer patients at first diagnosis, patients who are treated with radiotherapy after breast conserving surgery or modified radical mastectomy, no medical history of hyperthyroidism, hypothyroidism or thyroiditis, have never taken thyroxine, no thyroid surgery.

Exclusion Criteria:

Absence or ectopic thyroid gland, previous radiotherapy of the neck, diseases of thalamus or pituitary, previous radiotherapy of thalamus or pituitary
